kun reading compounds: 鉈【なた】nata, sturdy broad-bladed knife, used in woodcraft and hunting (often with a rectangular blade)
大鉈【おおなた】large sturdy broad-bladed knife, used in woodcraft and hunting.
薙刀【なぎなた】naginata, polearm with a curved single-edged blade (similar to a glaive), naginata, martial art of wielding the naginata
